ygData.subject: The Hostage Situation
ygData.msgSnippet: How in the pit would Hot Rod have ANY codes whatsoever from the Cybertronian Fire. He wasn t any high official, he didn t even spend that much time in the

Subject: The Hostage Situation
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 4.0 for Windows 95 sub 107
From: Yanshosh@...

How in the pit would Hot Rod have ANY codes whatsoever from the Cybertronian 
Fire. He wasn't any high official, he didn't even spend that much time in the 
bridge. And I don't remember Kluster, Firearm, Proto, Rex, Grimmler, or 
Chordate telling him any of the codes.

::Ramulus/Firearm/Proto/Smokescreen/Slayer::

Ramulus continues walking, thinking over Koj's suggestion. "No," he replies 
to the cloaked bot, "We have a few air troops as it is, but we need the 
ground troops."

He looks up as Prebon and Spears come into view, shouts from Spears floating 
back to him. That didn't sound like Spears at all, not the Spears that yelled 
at Unitron back when the Newcomers attacked the Ark... But where was Striker?

He frowns, slowly aproaching.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Firearm and Proto were flying high above Prebon and Spears, looking down at 
them, their jetpacks not making a sound. Both of them could feel a battle 
coming, they've had enough military experience to know that they wern't 
getting Spears back so easilly.. But they couldn't see Striker anywhere.

THe two bots frown, weapons ready.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Smokescreen stops, Prebon in clear view. He had his gun out, waiting for 
something to happen.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Slayer's eyes narrow as he watches Ramulus get closer and closer, his weapons 
tracking the Maximal. Soon, Ramulus would be in firing range...

His eyes narrow as he sees Lunarpine next to Ramulus. What was that bot doing 
here? He glances at Prebon, wondering if his master had noticed.
